description: As the weather heats up, many people start to look for thirst-quenching drinks to help them cool down. One delicious and cooling option is Chilcano De Maracuya.This drink hails from Peru and is made with pisco, maracuya (passionfruit),&nbsp;ginger ale, and&nbsp;bitters. It's the perfect drink for a hot summer's day!The pisco gives the drink a delicious base, while the maracuya provides a tart and fragrant flavor. The ginger ale helps to add a bit of sweetness and bubbliness, while the bitters provide depth and balance.
name: Chilcano De Maracuya
